title: Week 19 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 19th week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, September 27th, 2021.

## ETHEREUM POOLS

Remove 400 BAL from the Flexible BAL allocation from USDC/WETH 50/50. This pool will now receive 1100 BAL per week.

Remove 30 BAL from the Flexible BAL allocation from VITA/WETH 80/20. This pool will now receive 110 BAL per week. This pool is also being incentivised with 1845 VITA per week. 

Add 30 BAL from the Flexible BAL allocation to VITA/WETH 50/50. This pool will now receive 170 BAL per week. This pool is also being incentivised with 2350 VITA per week.

## POLYGON POOLS
There are no proposed changes this week.

## ARBITRUM POOLS
Allocate 400 BAL from the Flexible BAL allocation to PICKLE/WETH 80/20. This pool will now receive 400 BAL per week. This pool is also being incentivised with 1023 PICKLE per week.

Remove a Tier 3 slot from USDC/USDT stablepool. This pool will now receive 0 BAL per week.

Add a Tier 3 slot to USDC/USDT/DAI stablepool. This pool will now receive 2,500 BAL per week.

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/872
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
